recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, Bacon, Eggs, Parmesan Cheese, Black Pepper
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon. Whisk eggs with Parmesan. Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture. Season with pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-fry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Vegetables (broccoli, carrots, onions), Soy Sauce, Ginger, Garlic
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry chicken. Add vegetables and cook until tender. Season with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.

recipes.name: Pizza Margherita
recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Basil
recipes.instructions: Roll out dough, spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella, and bake. Garnish with basil.
recipes.notes: Use fresh mozzarella for best results.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Sugar, Butter, Eggs, Chocolate Chips
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and mix. Combine with dry ingredients. Fold in chocolate chips. Bake.
